tool_description: Calculates electrical requirements and circuit needs for kitchen appliances and lighting to ensure adequate power supply.

small_appliance_circuits.description: Number of small appliance circuits needed

error_messages: Invalid amperage values: Appliance amperage must be positive numbers.
Invalid voltage: Range voltage must be 120V or 240V.
Overload condition: Total electrical load exceeds safe circuit capacity.
Insufficient circuits: Not enough circuits specified for electrical code compliance.
usage: Input appliance electrical specifications to calculate total load, required circuits, and electrical panel requirements for kitchen renovation.

dedicated_circuits.description: List of appliances requiring dedicated circuits

panel_upgrade_needed.description: Whether electrical panel upgrade is required
